TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InertiaRotationBehavior extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制惯性运动期间旋转操作的减速度。

span.span: Controls the deceleration of a rotation manipulation during inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类指定旋转操作在延迟时的行为方式。The class specifies how a rotation manipulation behaves when it is inertia. 使用 事件中的 属性执行以下操作：Use the property in the event to do the following: - 通过设置 "" 属性来指定惯性开始时的初始速度。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 通过设置 属性，指定惯性结束时所需的操作旋转。Specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 通过设置 "" 属性，指定所需的惯性减速度。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 设置 或 ，但不能同时设置两者。Set either the or the , but not both. 设置其中一个属性后，如果另一个属性具有值，则其他属性将更改为 。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview). 有关响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练：创建你的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application). ## Examples 下面的示例演示 事件处理程序，并为惯性期间使用的转换、扩展和旋转设置所需的减速度。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 本示例摘自[演练：创建您的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)中的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationinertiastarting)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationinertiastarting)]

summary.span: 获取或设置旋转减慢的速率（度/平方毫秒）。

span.span: Gets or sets the rate the rotation slows in degrees per squared millisecond.

value.span: 旋转减慢的速率（度/平方毫秒）。

span.span: The rate the rotation slows in degrees per squared millisecond.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定惯性所需的减速度。Use the property to specify the desired deceleration of the inertia. 设置 或 ，但不能同时设置两者。Set either the or the , but not both. 设置其中一个属性后，如果另一个属性具有值，则其他属性将更改为 。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview). 有关响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练：创建你的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application).

span.span: The property is set to infinity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定惯性结束时所需的操作旋转。Use the property to specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends. 设置 或 ，但不能同时设置两者。Set either the or the , but not both. 设置其中一个属性后，如果另一个属性具有值，则其他属性将更改为 。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview). 有关响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练：创建你的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application).
